error.message: The "app.root" service is deprecated in drupal:9.0.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use the app.root parameter instead. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3080612
The "app.root" service is deprecated in drupal:9.0.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use the app.root parameter instead. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3080612

Class Drupal\ui_patterns\Template\TwigExtension extends deprecated class Twig_Extension: since Twig 2.7, use "Twig\Extension\AbstractExtension" instead
Instantiation of deprecated class Twig_SimpleFunction: since Twig 2.7, use "Twig\TwigFunction" instead
Instantiation of deprecated class Twig_SimpleFunction: since Twig 2.7, use "Twig\TwigFunction" instead
The "app.root" service is deprecated in drupal:9.0.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use the app.root parameter instead. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3080612
